name: Ajani's Sunstriker
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

name: Angel's Mercy
oracle_text: You gain 7 life.
flavor_text:
"She rose above me, and in that moment Varrik the Bloody died and I was born."
—Varrik the Just

name: Arbor Elf
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target Forest.
flavor_text: "The forest will surround you with its life if you are still and calm."

name: Archaeomancer
oracle_text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

name: Attended Knight
oracle_text:
First strike
When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

name: Aven Squire
oracle_text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

name: Battleflight Eagle
oracle_text:
Flying
When Battleflight Eagle enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Eagles make fine mounts, but they're too proud to carry anyone for long.

name: Bladetusk Boar
oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor_text: Those who dare stand in its path are either brave or mindless. Or in the case of goblins, both.

name: Bloodhunter Bat
oracle_text:
Flying
When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "What I need is your blood. What I don't need is your permission."

name: Bond Beetle
oracle_text: When Bond Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
A beetle on your shoulder
—Elvish expression meaning "a blessing of luck"

name: Bountiful Harvest
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
flavor_text:
"When we fail to see the beauty in every tree, we are no better than humans."
—Saelia, elvish scout

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor_text:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we—"
"No."

name: Captain's Call
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"Who among you has the courage to face certain death? Who will heed my call?"
—Rayel Vanger, Firstblade of Thune

name: Centaur Courser
flavor_text:
"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
—Ramal, sage of Westgate

name: Chandra's Fury
oracle_text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
flavor_text: "I asked if they wanted to do things the easy way. I meant easy for me."

name: Craterize
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"'Utterly' is my favorite way to destroy something."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Crippling Blight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.
flavor_text:
"Still alive? No matter. I'll leave you as a warning to others who would oppose me."
—Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

name: Dark Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.
flavor_text: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

name: Deadly Recluse
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

name: Disentomb
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"I deal so often in rotting corpses that when I come across the freshly dead . . . why, it's like my birthday come early."
—Nevinyrral, necromancer

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Divine Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
flavor_text: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

name: Divine Verdict
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: "Guilty."

name: Downpour
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures.
flavor_text:
"The sky holds vast oceans. They are at your fingertips if you know how to call them."
—Talrand, sky summoner

name: Dragon Hatchling
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
—Liliana Vess

name: Duty-Bound Dead
oracle_text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{3}{B}: Regenerate Duty-Bound Dead. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Elvish Visionary
oracle_text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

name: Encrust
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text:
"Barnacles are the sea's final defense."
—Garild, merfolk mage

name: Erase
oracle_text: Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Don't trust your eyes, for mages are skilled in deception. Trust only in your faith. It will wipe everything clean."
—Lila, Erunian priest

name: Essence Drain
oracle_text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Life's essence is a nectar unlike any I tasted when I lived as a mortal."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Essence Scatter
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text:
"What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."
—Jace Beleren

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

name: Faerie Invaders
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor_text: Small enough to penetrate the narrowest crack in a castle wall and numerous enough to hack apart a griffin.

name: Farseek
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

name: Fire Elemental
flavor_text:
"Fire set free is a fearsome force—destructive, merciless, always hungry. Given direction, it is much worse."
—Jeflin, Vastwood shaman

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

name: Giant Scorpion
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

name: Glorious Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"One's blade is only as sharp as one's conviction."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Goblin Arsonist
oracle_text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

name: Goblin Battle Jester
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a red spell, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Somehow goblins found a tactical advantage by sending a clown to war.

name: Griffin Protector
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

name: Guardian Lions
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Approach in peace or not at all.

name: Guardians of Akrasa
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Harbor Serpent
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

name: Hydrosurge
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Thirsty?"
—Drunvalus, hydromancer

name: Index
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: "What good is having all the right answers if you have them at all the wrong times?"

name: Kindled Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Rage is a dangerous weapon. Your enemies will try to use your anger against you. Use it against them first."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Kraken Hatchling
flavor_text: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

name: Krenko's Command
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

name: Liliana's Shade
oracle_text:
When Liliana's Shade enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{B}: Liliana's Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Mark of the Vampire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
flavor_text:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
—Sorin Markov

name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
flavor_text:
"The merfolk of the Pearl Trident have risen from the waves since the earliest days, at times allies to humans, other times enemies. Now their power is cresting again, and who can say which way the new tide will flow."
—Kalis, Onean scholar

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"What a pity. You should have written it down."
—Liliana Vess

name: Mind Sculpt
oracle_text: Target opponent mills seven cards.
flavor_text:
"Your mind was a curious mix of madness and genius. I just took away the genius."
—Jace Beleren

name: Mogg Flunkies
oracle_text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Pillarfield Ox
flavor_text:
"May starving fleas birth a thousand generations on your stubborn hide, cow!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Prey Upon
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"You don't find many old werewolf hunters."
—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

name: Primal Huntbeast
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"To the unskilled, it appears as blurred patches of distorted light. Few have seen its true form."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Ranger's Path
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The forest can seem like a dense maze. Those who travel the canopy know otherwise.

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Devouring books is only the beginning. The librarian's next.

name: Reckless Brute
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Reckless Brute attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: His mind knows no fear, registering only the burning impulse to destroy.

name: Rummaging Goblin
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

name: Safe Passage
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
flavor_text: As she shepherds the faithful, the angel's radiance is a shield of salvation.

name: Scroll Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: The arcane academies along the coast were powerless to protect themselves from the brazen raiders of the Kapsho Seas.

name: Searing Spear
oracle_text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

name: Sentinel Spider
oracle_text: Vigilance, reach
flavor_text:
"Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Serpent's Gift
oracle_text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Venom is nature's way of redressing the imbalance between weak and mighty.

name: Servant of Nefarox
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "My cause is power, and at the altar of power I will gladly forfeit my soul."

name: Show of Valor
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Duty, honor, and valor are either in your heart or they are not. You will never know for certain until you are tested."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Sign in Blood
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

name: Silvercoat Lion
flavor_text:
"In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Smelt
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Looks like that wasn't darksteel after all."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Spiked Baloth
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If a baloth isn't hungry, it's dead.

name: Timberpack Wolf
oracle_text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
flavor_text:
"The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The pup looked over the treetops, eyeing the man who just yesterday had kicked her. Suddenly, her hunger was infused with pure delight.

name: Tormented Soul
oracle_text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

name: Tricks of the Trade
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: "Pathetic. You might as well have protected your treasures with a paper box and some string."

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

name: Turn to Slag
oracle_text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
flavor_text:
"If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Not to be. That is the answer.

name: Vastwood Gorger
flavor_text:
"A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."
—Mulak Ffar, *Vastwood Biodiversity*

name: Vedalken Entrancer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: "Don't get any ideas."

name: Vile Rebirth
oracle_text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text:
"'Here lies our beloved Gartu, the gentlest of all men.' Ooh, I love irony."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Volcanic Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: The mountains bend to no one.

name: Walking Corpse
flavor_text:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Wall of Fire
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Mercy is for those who keep their distance.

name: Warclamp Mastiff
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"One bite from that dog will send you to the healer's tent for days."
—Watchmaster Finn of An Karras

name: War Falcon
oracle_text:
Flying
War Falcon can't attack unless you control a Knight or a Soldier.
flavor_text: The falcon is the picture of nobility, maintaining a regal bearing even as it conducts the bloody business of war.

name: Watercourser
oracle_text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow."
—Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

name: Welkin Tern
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"It preys on other birds. And drakelings. And drakes. Pretty much anything that crosses its flight path is fair game."
—Amira, skycaptain of Thune

name: Wild Guess
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: No guts, no glory.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.

name: Yeva's Forcemage
oracle_text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

name: Zombie Goliath
flavor_text:
"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
